name: Oxidizer
description: Substances that give off oxygen and cause or contribute to combustion

name: Explosive 1.6 N
description: Extremely insensitive articles with no mass explosion hazard

name: Flammable Liquid
description: Liquids that can easily catch fire

name: Infectious substance
description: Substances containing pathogens

name: Organic Peroxide
description: Thermally unstable organic substances

name: Toxic Gas, Inhalation Hazard
description: Gases that are toxic when inhaled

name: Poison Inhalation Hazard
description: Substances toxic when inhaled

name: Dangerous When Wet
description: Substances that emit flammable gases when in contact with water

name: Poison, Toxic, PG III
description: Toxic substances - Packing Group III

name: Flammable Solid
description: Solids that can easily catch fire

name: Flammable Gas
description: Gases that can easily catch fire

name: Class 9
description: Miscellaneous dangerous substances

name: Corrosive
description: Substances that can cause severe damage to living tissue or materials

name: Non-Flammable Gas
description: Gases that are not flammable

name: Explosive 1.4 B
description: Minor explosion hazard confined to package

name: Radioactive, Fissile
description: Radioactive materials capable of nuclear fission

name: Explosive 1.1 A
description: Mass explosion hazard

name: Spontaneously Combustible
description: Substances liable to spontaneous combustion

name: Explosive 1.3 C
description: Fire hazard with minor blast hazard

name: Blasting Agent D
description: Very insensitive explosive substances

name: Explosive 1.2 B
description: Projection hazard but not mass explosion hazard
